name: Sickening Sentinel of the Defeated Swine
name_original: Sickening Sentinel of the Defeated Swine
description: This is a short 4 page (closer to three) dungeon one-shot for Five Torches Deep. The adventurers are set to battle against a group of cultists who are seeking to resurrect The Defeated Swine. It is filled with disease and descriptions of gross images so content warning for that. Hope it is gross and interesting and makes for a couple of hours of fun.
